title: [Serious][D4+] Sponsored Team LF Dedicated: Support & Subs
body:
We are a sponsored League of Legends 5v5 team looking for additional members to round out our roster. Recently we've had few people step down due to real life scheduling issues and we're looking to fill those spots with like-minded individuals who can step in to an established team and grow with us.

*****
**Currently Looking For**

* Support (Starter)
* Top (Substitute) - Will get considerable playtime.
* Jungle (Substitute)

*****
**About Us**


* We are a stable and mature ranked 5v5 team that have been together for over a year.
* We are not your typical "new team that die in 2 days after placements." We're very consistent.
* Our team members' individual ELO/league range from Diamond 1 to Diamond 5.
* Team itself is currently at Plat 1 with much higher mmr (match-making rating).
* We gear towards running team compositions that make sense rather than just blindly picking champions.
* We practice from 5pm EST (2pm PST) until around 9pm EST (6pm PST) on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays.
* The schedule is a little flexible depending on the other members joining. Feel free to ask about it here or in game.
* Once we're set with roster, we'll resume Go4LoL tournaments which are held Sunday afternoons.

*****
**Requirements**

* You must be **Diamond 4** or higher in Solo Q this season.
* You must be able to use voice communications. We currently use TeamSpeak3 with Skype as backup.
* You must be able to make our schedule listed above, or be close to it.
* You must have a good collection of champions and are not limited by a small pool.
* You must know how to discuss things maturely without letting emotions run wild. Mistakes happen.
* You must be willing to learn, improve, and help others improve.

*****
**Apply!**

If you've made it this far and would like to try out for the team, please fill out the following little questionnaire to the best of your abilities and we'll get back to you shortly.

> Summoner name?: 
> Your age?: 
> Can you make our schedule?: 
> Your current solo queue division?:  
> What is your desired role?: 
> What is the weakest part of your game?: 
> Any tournament experience?: 
> Any other info (optional)?: 

*****
We would highly prefer you to reply here first, but you can also reach us in game (**Al Bundy** or **Sexpanther**) if you have any questions or would like to apply privately. Thanks everyone and good luck!

*****
Edit: We're not 100% sure how the new boards work, but we'd really appreciate the upvotes so this stays near top! Thank you.

Any other info (optional)?:  good calls when ganking, providing good support while ganks, and i know my champions limits, as well as the enemy teams champs limits.

Summoner name?: CocoMisu

Your age?: 22

Can you make our schedule?: yes

Your current solo queue division?: D5 (peaked at D3)

What is your desired role?: Support ( I play all support except braum which needs to be worked on)

What is the weakest part of your game?: mid late game engage decision

Any tournament experience?: a lot

Any other info (optional)?: play a lot of rank 5s, highest team i played for is placed in D3.

**Summoner name?:** Cheetosrule

**Your age?:** 16

**Can you make our schedule?:** Yes

**Your current solo queue division?:** Platinum 2. I attempted to switch mains to jungle {{summoner:11}}  and free fell while I was learning jungle.{{champion:32}}  *When I mained support I was diamond 4 ~90 lp before the original team I was on was disbanded.*

**What is your desired role?:** Support {{champion:412}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:53}} 

**What is the weakest part of your game?**: If I start making silly mistakes/decisions I get quiet on voice communications.

**Any tournament experience?:** I have played in the Warrior Esports weekly tournaments for many weeks and had success against challenger teams such as Twist and Shout Fanfic, melondogs, Warriors Anonymous (currently not challenger), Dream House, Krooks (split ways and became Traitors Not Needed), Traitors Not Needed (featuring former XDG member Bloodwater), We Play For RP (Featuring well known challenger players like Ninjaken), and a few other teams that have disbanded or dropped challenger. I have also played in the weekly NotSoStock Gaming tournaments and have had some success there also. Finally, I played in an "LCS" style tournament format hosted by ThunderDog Esports where one day per week, teams were scheduled for seeding and then put into a single elimination best of 3 bracket based on the seeding and the team I was on placed 2nd to Warriors Anonymous.

**Any other info (optional)?:** While I was the support for my team, I shotcalled 95% of the time and led my team to success. I've also been told by many short lived teams that I seem like a fun person to be around and that I meshed well with everyone on the team within the first game. Additionally, I have been playing the game since season 1 and know quite a bit about the game. I remember the gold ol' Force Of Nature and Heart of Gold days and when TSM could poop on everyone in NA.
